Oops! I've just been informed that the Neutral base is in North 
America (I probably should have known that). Since Demise was in 
Egypt, its impossible for him to travel that far, so forget my posts 
with Demise.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RickEKildahl@a... wrote:
> Red Bolt shivers, feeling the cold of the night. He notices mech 
fluid 
> leaking from the spot where his arm was separated from his torso. 
Red Bolt 
> accepts the grim reality of his fate and starts to go offline when 
he notices 
> a silhouette in the distance. Then Red Bolt falls into Stasis Lock.
